page.title: 04Tongue School Tadpoles
page.content: The following letter was sent to 'Blue Peter', the children's very popular TV programme. 'I am writing to tell you about our conservation of frogs. Our teacher found the spawn in a puddle between the goal posts on our football pitch in February. She took them home and for while they stayed in a seed box. Then they were put in a fish tank with weeds.When they were brought into school they were all sandy and we didn't know if they would survive. But now they are wriggling about and some have legs.In a few weeks we are going to let them go in a pond.' Blue Peter answered the letter and sent the writer a badge. The tadpoles were released in two batches and it is hoped that some of them managed to survive.
